description: This file defines React components for an accessible accordion UI, using Radix UI primitives and custom styling. It creates enhanced components for Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionTrigger, and AccordionContent, which are styled and composed for use within a React application.

classes.name: Accordion
classes.description: An alias for Radix UI's Accordion Root, representing the root container of the accordion.

classes.name: AccordionItem
classes.description: A React component wrapping Radix UI's AccordionPrimitive.Item, adding custom styles and forwarding refs.

classes.name: AccordionTrigger
classes.description: A React component wrapping Radix UI's AccordionPrimitive.Trigger, with an arrow icon and styling for toggling.

classes.name: AccordionContent
classes.description: A React component wrapping Radix UI's AccordionPrimitive.Content, managing transition animations and styling.

methods.name: React.forwardRef
methods.description: Creates React components that forward refs to underlying DOM elements.
